description: Integrating environment into poverty reduction strategies and the implementation of national development programmes

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Intended outputs:
1) Have a physical office space set-up for the UNDP-UNEP Poverty and Environment Facility
2) Deliver effective poverty-environment mainstreaming support to countries as global, regional and country levels
3) Knowledge Management system (platform) in place and operational.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Poverty-Environment Facility

title: Operationalizing the Joint UNDP-UNEP Poverty-Environment
